steps: Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner.
Navigate to the location of Document11.docx and select it.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the top menu.
In the 'Protect' group, click on 'Restrict Editing'.
In the 'Restrict Editing' pane on the right, click on 'Stop Protection'.
Click on 'OK' to confirm and remove the editing restrictions.
You have successfully enabled editing for Document11.docx.
